verses.verse: <S%H5608>Declare<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> his <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> works among all the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised!<s%> He is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods.<s%>
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
<S%H1935>Honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5797>him.<s%> Strength and <S%H8597>beauty<s%> are in his <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due to his <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H2691>courts.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H4427>reigns.<s%>" The <S%H8398>world<s%> is also <S%H3559>established.<s%> It <S%H4131>can't<s%> be moved. He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H1523>glad,<s%> and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%> Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and its <S%H4393>fullness!<s%>
Let the <S%H7704>field<s%> and all that is in it <S%H5937>exult!<s%> Then all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>woods<s%> shall sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%>

<S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for he <S%H935>comes,<s%> for he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with his <S%H530>truth.<s%>
